There's been a port of Prism to Silverlight, but can Prism be used with a XBAP as is?
 (assuming the default internet security zone, and I won't be trying to use XML config)
You must set your application to full-trust if you want to use Prism. The default internet security zone will not work by default.
My apologies, I failed to find this post which addresses the question with some solutions: http://www.codeplex.com/CompositeWPF/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=31058
